Concierge.introDescription: Experience the pinnacle of luxury with our bespoke concierge services. We handle the details so you can focus on creating lasting memories. From private transfers to exclusive reservations, excellence is our standard.
Concierge.supportDesc: Dedicated assistance at any time, anywhere.
Concierge.expertiseDesc: Curated experiences and hidden local access.

OwnerServices.title: Our key services can unleash the potential of your property
OwnerServices.desc: Our mission is to offer complete services which are totally transparent to the owner. Calendars, bookings, prices, expenses, and revenue - everything is one click away.
OwnerServices.quote: "We pride ourselves on being close to every single one of our partners."

transparency.title: Online Transparency
transparency.desc: Access everything about your property and listings 24/7 from anywhere in the world thanks to our LovelyStay dashboard.

checkin.title: Check-in & Check-out
checkin.desc: Our hospitality team offers constant guest communication 24/7 and is readily available to meet all guest's needs.

cleaning.title: Cleaning & Maintenance
cleaning.desc: We take care of your property and are always there to fix any situation, even when you are not.

account.title: Gestores de Conta
account.desc: The purpose of our dedicated account managers is to be there for you & represent your best interest in every situation.

design.title: Interior Design
design.desc: Our hospitality experts can support you in enhancing your space so as to improve your profitability.

legal.title: Fiscal & Legal Support
legal.desc: We offer tech solutions and consultancy services for any topic related to the rental of your property.

OwnerExperience.title: Experience you can trust: delivering results for property owners
OwnerExperience.desc: LovelyStay is recognized for providing high-quality property management services to owners in Portugal and abroad. With an experienced team in the areas of hospitality, revenue management, and information technology.

OwnerPricing.title: Join us and enjoy worry-free property management!
OwnerPricing.subtitle: Combine our packages to create a personalized management solution!

total.selectPrompt: Select a package to see fee.

AboutIntro.p1: The core of our business is to excel in what we do and strive to keep our position as the leading boutique property management company in Porto, where we currently focus all of our operations. We are passionate about the city and proud to be the starting point of every of our guests journey in this captivating and stunningly beautiful city.
AboutIntro.p2: We handpick and decorate our properties to the highest standards just so you feel truly welcome and taken care of, and that goes far beyond the aesthetic of the property you are staying in. Our unparalleled service is the key to our success.

2020.title: The Beginning
2020.text: We opened our office and Welcome Center in Porto's downtown, marking the start of our journey in this stunningly beautiful city.

2021.title: Growth & Resilience
2021.text: Despite the global challenges, we handpicked more properties and refined our unparalleled service to ensure our guests felt truly welcome.

2022.title: Expanding Horizons
2022.text: Our boutique property management company became a reference in Porto, expanding our portfolio with curated, high-standard homes.

2023.title: Design & Excellence
2023.text: We integrated deeper interior design expertise to elevate the aesthetic of our properties, merging comfort with luxury.

2024.title: Innovative Connections
2024.text: Launching new digital experiences to bridge the gap between our local expertise and our guests' global expectations.

2025.title: The Future of Hospitality
2025.text: Striving to keep our position as the leading boutique company, constantly evolving our operations for better guest experiences.

2026.title: Global Reach
2026.text: From Porto to the World - our mission remains firm: to provide the best local memories through global standards of excellence.

AboutForm.title: Our Team At Your Service
AboutForm.subtitle: If you have a property and would like us to manage it and increase your revenue, talk to us!

Blog.heroSubtitle: Explore our curated collection of Porto's best kept secrets, travel tips, and luxury lifestyle inspiration.

Contact.title: Contact
Contact.description1: Get in touch and we will guide you through our process. It is simpler than what most people think, so what are you waiting for?
Contact.description2: Let's transform that beautiful house of yours, in a home for guests all over the world!
Contact.formSubtitle: Find out how much you can make with LovelyMemories as your Airbnb Management Company
Contact.metadataDesc: Get in touch with Lovely Memories for property management estimates.

concierge.title: Concierge services
concierge.description: Enhance your stay with our premium concierge services. Our team is dedicated to making your experience unforgettable.
concierge.disclaimer: Extras are subject to availability and may carry additional charges.
concierge.breakfastDesc: Start your day with a freshly prepared breakfast served in your villa.
concierge.transferDesc: Premium chauffeur service from/to the airport for up to 4 guests.

bedrooms.babyCotInfo: Baby cot and high chair are available on request at no extra cost.
bedrooms.detailedSleeping: Detailed configuration of sleeping and bathing areas

step1.title: Your Information
step1.subtitle: Please provide your contact details to proceed with the booking.

step2.title: Reservation Details
step2.subtitle: Let us know if you have any special requirements.
step2.specialRequestsPlaceholder: Allergies, late check-in, baby cot requirements...

step3.title: Payment
step3.subtitle: How would you like to pay for your stay?
step3.instructions: Make your payment directly into our bank account. Please use the Reference Number as the payment reference. Your reservation will not be confirmed until the funds have cleared in our account.
step3.comingSoon: Coming soon: Stripe Integration. This is a demonstration view.

security.encryption: We use industry-standard encryption to protect your personal information.

success.title: Booking confirmed!
success.subtitle: Your reservation is being prepared. You will receive an email confirmation shortly.

errors.sessionExpired: Your session might have expired or the link is invalid. Please try reserving the property again.
errors.nameError: Full name must be at least 3 characters
errors.emailError: Please enter a valid email address
errors.serverError: A server error occurred. Please try again.

praca-dos-poveiros.title: Praça dos Poveiros
praca-dos-poveiros.subtitle: Studio Loft
description: Stylish studio loft located in one of Porto's most famous squares.
Perfect for solo travelers or couples wanting to be in the center of the action.
Surrounded by the best local restaurants and bars.
highlights: Walkable distance to all major sights.
homeTruths: Located on a busy square, some noise expected.

studio.name: Studio Area
studio.description: Open space with double bed and kitchenette.

the-flower-power.title: The Flower Power
the-flower-power.subtitle: Two Bedroom Home
description: A charming and cozy two-bedroom home with a beautiful garden.
Filled with natural light and colorful decorations to brighten your stay.
Ideal for families looking for a peaceful retreat.

paraiso-331.title: Paraíso 331
paraiso-331.subtitle: Modern Apartment
description: A stylish and modern apartment located in the Paraíso district. Perfectly situated to explore the best of Porto.
Featuring contemporary amenities and a comfortable living space, it's an ideal choice for couples and small families.
Enjoy the vibrant local neighborhood with easy access to public transport and famous landmarks.
highlights: Modern interior design with high-quality finishes.
Quiet residential area close to downtown.
homeTruths: Located on the second floor with elevator access.

living_room.name: Living Room
living_room.description: Spacious area with sofa and TV.

avenida-luxury.title: Avenida Luxury
avenida-luxury.subtitle: Penthouse
description: Exclusive penthouse on Avenida da Liberdade, offering the ultimate luxury experience in Lisbon.
Featuring a private terrace with panoramic views of the city and high-end finishes throughout.
Prime location surrounded by luxury boutiques and top-rated restaurants.
highlights: Expansive private terrace with city views.
Located on the most prestigious avenue in Lisbon.
homeTruths: Elevator access directly to the penthouse.

master.name: Master Suite
master.description: King bed with walk-in closet and en-suite.

sunset-villa.title: Sunset Villa
sunset-villa.subtitle: Beachfront Home
description: Stunning beachfront villa in Quinta do Lago with direct access to the beach.
Designed for relaxation with a private pool, spacious gardens, and outdoor dining areas.
The perfect getaway for large families or groups seeking privacy and luxury.
highlights: Private heated pool and large garden.
homeTruths: Pool heating available at extra cost.
Car recommended for exploring the area.

master.name: Master Suite
master.description: King bed with ocean view and balcony.

chiado-loft.title: Chiado Loft
chiado-loft.subtitle: Classic Studio
description: Charming studio loft in the heart of Chiado, Lisbon's cultural district.
Retaining original features like stone walls and wooden shutters combined with modern comfort.
Steps away from iconic cafes, theaters, and shops.
highlights: Walking distance to Bairro Alto and Baixa.

studio.name: Main Room
studio.description: Open plan sleeping and living area.

ocean-breeze.title: Ocean Breeze
ocean-breeze.subtitle: Modern Apartment
description: Modern apartment located in the vibrant Vilamoura Marina.
Enjoy views of the yachts and easy access to beaches, golf courses, and nightlife.
Bright and airy space with a large balcony perfect for sunset drinks.

rdm-ii.title: RDM II
rdm-ii.subtitle: Premium Apartments
description: Experience luxury living in the heart of Porto. RDM II offers premium apartments designed for comfort and style.
Located just steps away from the Crystal Palace gardens, this apartment merges contemporary design with classical Porto architecture.
Perfect for families or business travelers seeking a sophisticated home away from home.
highlights: Stunning views of the Douro River from the private balcony.
Handpicked local artworks decorating every room.
Fully equipped gourmet kitchen for food lovers.
homeTruths: The apartment is on the third floor and there is no elevator.
Construction work is happening nearby during weekdays.
Pets are not allowed in this property.

rooms.name: Master Suite
rooms.details: Spacious master bedroom with premium linens and panoramic views.

rooms.name: Second Bedroom
rooms.details: Twin beds, large closet, and garden-facing window.

rooms.name: Social Area
rooms.details: Open-plan living and dining space with direct access to the balcony.

rooms.name: En-suite Bathroom
rooms.details: Luxury walk-in rainfall shower, dual vanity, and premium toiletries.
